Button.Name: ToggleButton
Button.Tooltip: Toggle between Equipment list and Appearance list

Page.Name: AutoInventory
Page.Tooltip: Auto inventory drop spot. Normal text is current weight.

Checkbox.Name: InventoryToggle
Checkbox.Tooltip: Toggle Inventory Bags

Page.Name: PaperdollPage
Page.Text: :a8d7734c23e23e64:You have equipped an item that must be attuned before it will be effective in combat.

IconStyle.description: Same as button but no iconrect
IconStyle.Name: KronoIconStyle

Page.Name: Housing
Page.Text: You don't currently own any homes.

Page.Name: ListPage
Page.Text: You have not created any dungeons.

Dropdownbox.Name: StatsDropdownbox
Dropdownbox.OnSelect: parent.Stats0.visible = SelectedItem.V0 parent.Stats1.visible = SelectedItem.V1 parent.Stats2.visible = SelectedItem.V2

Checkbox.Name: Anonymous
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee84251348991:Hides your guild and zone from "who" queries

Checkbox.Name: Roleplaying
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee842bfcd933d:When checked other players will not see your class and level

Checkbox.Name: AFK
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee84249f893dd:When checked other players will see you as being away. Incoming messages will be automatically replied to with a message saying you are away.

Checkbox.Name: LFW
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee842bd8f07d9:When checked other players will see you as looking for work.

Checkbox.Name: HideIllusion
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee84290cd4ecb:When checked illusions will not change your appearance

Checkbox.Name: DisplayHeraldry
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee842ee7f9694:When checked your cloak will display your guild heraldry

Checkbox.Name: DeclineDuels
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee8427fe337ef:Automatically decline all duels

Checkbox.Name: DeclineTrades
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee842d5d991eb:Automatically decline all trades

Checkbox.Name: DeclineGroups
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee8423ae2b076:Automatically decline to join groups

Checkbox.Name: DeclineRaids
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee84273105689:Automatically decline to join raids

Checkbox.Name: DeclineGuilds
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee84290f07c10:Automatically decline to join guilds

Checkbox.Name: DeclineVoice
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a8d7734c2bdf3aed:Automatically decline Voice Chat invitations

Checkbox.Name: DeclineLON
Checkbox.Tooltip: :42aee842f5c434b6_1:Automatically decline Legends Of Norrath Challenges

Checkbox.Name: HideAchievements
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a8d7734c5c59d666:Hide achievements from others that may inspect you.

Text.Name: AutoAttackLabel
Text.Tooltip: Force a type of auto attack after casting an ability

Checkbox.Name: EnableFB
Checkbox.OnPress: socialmedia facebook enable checked enabled = false
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a8d7734cc68b8263:Send character achievements to Facebook. Also allows the use of the /facebook and /share commands.

Checkbox.Name: EnableTwitter
Checkbox.OnPress: socialmedia twitter enable checked enabled = false
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a8d7734cac982081:Send character achievements to Twitter. Also allows the use of the /tweet, /twitter and /share commands.

Checkbox.Name: EnableCensus
Checkbox.OnPress: socialmedia census enable checked enabled = false
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a8d7734cfb406fe6:Make this character publically viewable on EQ2Players.

Checkbox.Name: EnableCensusAlts
Checkbox.OnPress: socialmedia census_alt enable checked enabled = false
Checkbox.Tooltip: Show this character as an Alt of your other characters.

Button.Name: ShareButton
Button.TooltipDisabled: Connect to Facebook or Twitter to enable sending updates!

Button.Name: VideoShareButton
Button.TooltipDisabled: Record and upload a YouTube video.

Checkbox.Name: EnableSoEmote
Checkbox.Tooltip: :a8d7734ca06a695d:Capture and share facial animation with webcam.

Page.Name: Frame
MercSummon
Page.Text: :a8d7734ceee51474:You may ask your mercenary to return in 1m 5s.

Page.Name: MercControls
Page.Text: :a8d7734ceee51474:You may ask your mercenary to return in 1m 5s.

:a8d7734c9e21bdb9:You must have an active or suspended mercenary to use this window.
You may hire mercenaries from most major cities.
:a8d7734cb1e09b37:You may not have a mercenary in this zone.

Page.Name: Frame
Page.Text: You must summon a pet to use this window
